attributes.action: Make D Day, June 6th a Public holiday to be remembered in perpertuity from the 6th June 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the great service that the servicemen and women of this country, and the civilians who provided assistance accomplished on D Day, and in light of the significant affect that it had on British history then this day should be remembered by the enactment of a public holiday

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
